official_title: A bill to amend Title XX of the Social Security Act to provide for service program planning and assessment.

summary.text: Amends Title XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act to require that not less than one-half of one percent of a State's allocation under such Title be directed to a "regional planning organization," as defined by this Act, for purposes of involving local government in the planning and evaluation of services provided under such Title.
